thread.title: Marcia
thread.title_full: White Mountain Puzzles reviewed by Marcia

author: Marcia
title: Marcia
text: These puzzles are fun with attractive designs - they have entertained family and friends on a number of occasions. The quality of the pieces (1000) are excellent and the colors are vivid. My only criticism is that you need to provide a large paper version of the puzzle so more than one person can reference the picture at one time. Keep the puzzles coming--great value and fun to make!
